example.parse: (IP (ADVP (AD 但是)) (PU ，) (NP-SBJ (QP (CD 许多)) (NP (NN 兼并))) (VP (ADVP (AD 明显)) (VP (VC 是) (NP-PRD (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (NN 公司)) (VP (PP-PRP (P 为) (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (VRD (VV 生存) (VV 下去))))) (VP (MSP 而) (VP (ADVP (AD 不得不)) (VP (VV 采取) (NP-OBJ (-NONE- *T*-1))))))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NN 行动))))))
